verbose_text: Our current data support this idea because (1) we know that expression of RAG proteins brings recombining homologous as well as heterologous antigen receptor alleles together in the nucleus prior to cleavage; (2) we have also found that RAG brings a subset of RAG enriched genes into close contact with recombining loci; and (3) mutant RAG2-S365A-expressing cells generate reciprocal translocations between Igk and other loci.
